column8: Span is how far a simulant randomly moves in one step
How far a simulant searches for a nearby shopping centre (etc..) to visit. Happens after moving.
How often a simulant searches for nearby shopping centres to visit.
The proportion of people that try (at all) to avoid others.
The proportion of time that people-avoiders try to avoid others.
PPA and PTA are set at the start of a stage and drop by 1% per day down to this bound.
Whether tracked cases are isolated as well as their household.
What proportion of the workforce is considered to be essential.
The proportion of people that always wear a mask (except when at home).
Whether the tracking system is in use.
This many people are randomly teleported halfway around the world each day.
